tweets.html:
60+ year olds of the world, please, allow me to help you find the page up/down button on your remote control.

I think I want a job writing for "The Good Wife" mostly so I can write a case involving a gay dating app and name it Woofster.

— Joe Reid (@joereid) December 26, 2013

Gun control sounds like a dangerous but baller ass way to change the channel

— Jeffrey Hadz (@Hadzilla) December 26, 2013

when feeling down i try to remind myself that there's still time for Ralph Macchio to star in a Karate Kid sequel called Karate Man

One of the On Demand categories is "Bingeworthy TV" and it includes Sean Saves The World

Netflix has Far from Heaven listed under Romantic Movies. Do not go on a date with Netflix.

— Mike McComb (@Rube_Goldberg) December 26, 2013

This Justin Bieber doc better stream soon, so I can watch it with only the NSA knowing about it.

— Austen Rachlis (@arachlis) December 26, 2013

Media specificity argument: COUGAR TOWN on TV is tolerable. Promo on movie screen draws out show's true insufferability.

— Jeffrey Sconce (@JeffreySconce) December 25, 2013

From what I could gather A CHRISTMAS STORY is a 24 hr movie about a kid who must celebrate Christmas over and over until he gets it right.

— Brian Lynch (@BrianLynch) December 25, 2013

So the nba gave the players sleeves (and ugly warm-ups) for Christmas. Assume they will be first in line to return tomorrow

— David J. Leonard (@drdavidjleonard) December 25, 2013

Next year on Christmas, I want all the players wearing old-timey strongman tank tops. #NBA

This Christmas go see “All White Cast: The Movie” from directors Martin Scorsese, David O. Russell, Adam McKay, Joel & Ethan Coen

— Wario on Christmas (@thedailyrobot) December 25, 2013

Everything I know about directing comes from that play scene in "A Charlie Brown Christmas".

— Jamiesen Borak (@that_darn_jbo) December 26, 2013

Santa Claus is just a joint piece of performance art between Shia Lebeouf and James Franco.

— Crutnacker (@Crutnacker) December 26, 2013

"Let's do an American version of Call the Midwife." "Ahem." "Oh, right, health care, never mind."

— Richard Lawson (@rilaws) December 26, 2013

Agent- I got you a part on Downton Abbey!
Black Actor- Great! What's the role?
Agent- Well, his name is 'Blackie',and he's, um... hello?

— Peter Serafinowicz (@serafinowicz) December 25, 2013

I'm not really into Downton Abbey anymore, but man, if that music isn't stirring.

— Emily Nussbaum (@emilynussbaum) December 26, 2013

It makes me feel like TIMES ARE CHANGING.

— Emily Nussbaum (@emilynussbaum) December 26, 2013

Trouble with Downton Abbey is my desire to burn the house to the ground.

— Emily Nussbaum (@emilynussbaum) December 26, 2013

MATT SMITH IS THE DOCTOR. Sorry I just had to say that cos in 90 minutes he won't be.

— Emily Payne (@emily_90) December 25, 2013

lol merry christmas and don't blink or you'll die, from the bbc

— Jade Azim (@JadeFrancesAzim) December 25, 2013

If the Doctor's name turns out to be Cristina Yang, let it be known that I predicted that years ago. #DoctorWho

— Richie (@RichieOnTV) December 25, 2013

Help there's a regeneration in my eye #DoctorWho

— Emily Payne (@emily_90) December 25, 2013

Can't watch Dr Who till later. I was worried about spoilers but none of you seem to know what's happening anyway.

— joe-gle bells (@mutablejoe) December 25, 2013

"I don't get it," says the Doctor. Yeah, join the club, mate. #DoctorWho

— David Brown (@MrDavidEBrown) December 25, 2013

cut to Moffat's house. he looks at everyone watching the special with him expectantly. they shake their heads. someone bursts into tears

— Lex Croucher (@lexcanroar) December 25, 2013

someone takes his chocolate coins. "but those are my chocolate coins!" he says. "you don't deserve chocolate coins" they reply in disgust

— Lex Croucher (@lexcanroar) December 25, 2013

Moffat tries to defend himself. "but [plot hole] [sexist joke] [rehash of shit plot line]!" he says. "I think it's best if you leave."

— Lex Croucher (@lexcanroar) December 25, 2013

A message from Matt Smith: “To the Whoniverse, thanks a million. You’re the best. I’ll miss you. And I’ll miss the madness.”

— Doctor Who Official (@bbcdoctorwho) December 25, 2013

FOR GOD SAKE, MR.MOFFAT, WHAT ARE YOU DOING?! #DoctorWho #doctorwhochristmasspecial

— джо (@metro_lights) December 25, 2013

tweets.author_name: Deck The Halls With Boughs Of Lisa
tweets.html:
Well, I'd like a 10 page explanation of that on my desk by Monday. #DoctorWho #wtf

— Deck The Halls With Boughs Of Lisa (@WorksWithWords) December 25, 2013

the phone rings. distantly, we hear Matt Smith sobbing. "honestly", he chokes out, "I wish I'd been cast in Downton instead"

— Lex Croucher (@lexcanroar) December 25, 2013

everyone Moffat knows watches from a beach as they cast him out into the open ocean on a small raft. "it's for the best" they sigh.

— Lex Croucher (@lexcanroar) December 25, 2013

Twitter reacts to #DoctorWho (no spoilers) pic.twitter.com/0Mza134gDX

— Chris Becker (@crsbecker) December 25, 2013

I would fucking SHIT MYSELF if an angry and confused Peter Capaldi asked me how to drive a telephone. I would SHIT my own SKULL.

— Sacha Fernando (@sacha_is_good) December 25, 2013

I am dead and I don't think I can regenerate. #DoctorWho

— Gaia Giacomelli (@gaiaaa) December 25, 2013

You know how Dan Harmon was bought back to Community after that disastrous third season? RTD is the Dan Harmon of #DoctorWho

He didn't say Fuckity Hi :{ #TheTimeOfTheDoctor

Peter capaldi more like peter cabaldi!!! Oh, he actually has hair? Fuck that guy

Hope the girl from Doctor Who marries the guy from SNL so they can be Karen & Taram Gillan-Killam.
